08229d80-ffa2-4a9d-b9f6-52c80804853d.name: "Setting up a CNN model for image classification"

ide.message: When a dev is setting up a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for image classification using TensorFlow and Keras, I want them to find this document because it covers the implementation of the CNN feature, including data preprocessing, model architecture, and training setup.
